com.cloudera.oryx.als.common

Interface PairRescorer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MultiLongPairRescorer

    public interface PairRescorer
    Like Rescorer, but operates on pairs of item IDs, not single item IDs.
    Author:
    Sean Owen
    See Also:
    Rescorer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isFiltered(String a, String b) 
      double rescore(String a, String b, double originalScore) 

    • Method Detail

      • rescore

        double rescore(String a,
             String b,
             double originalScore)
        Parameters:
        a - ID of first item in pair to rescore
        b - ID of second item in pair to rescore
        originalScore - original score from the recommender
        Returns:
        new score; return Double.NaN to exclude the pair from recommendation

      • isFiltered

        boolean isFiltered(String a,
                 String b)
        Parameters:
        a - ID of first item in pair to rescore
        b - ID of second item in pair to rescore
        Returns:
        true iff the pair should be removed from consideration
